duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess patients and formulate treatment plans for prosthetic and orthotic care.
Collaborate with physicians to evaluate patient needs and recommend treatment options.
Custom design, fabricate, and fit prostheses and orthoses to deliver exceptional outcomes for patients.
Instruct patients in the use of prosthetic and orthotic devices.
Provide in-service training to physicians and allied health care professionals.
Plan and implement strategies to meet and exceed revenue targets in coordination with management.

education_certification.credential: Current board certification in Prosthetics and/or Orthotics from the American Board for Certification (ABC) or the Board of Certification (BOC), or a baccalaureate degree in prosthetics and/or orthotics, or the foreign equivalent, and current ABC Board-Eligibility in Prosthetics and/or Orthotics.
